title: Prawko teoria
description:
A web app to help prepare for the driving license theory exam. 
 A web app that helps you prepare for the driving license theory exam. It includes practice quizzes, lessons, and soon AI assistance and mock tests.

title: Jinx IT!
description:
Fast-paced pixel-art dodge game inspired by Arcane (Netflix). 
 Jinx IT is a retro-style action game where you dodge waves of incoming missiles and try to survive as long as possible. Built in C using SDL3, it blends chaotic fun, pixel-perfect visuals, and explosive gameplay.

title: Portfolio page
description: A modern, fast, and SEO-friendly portfolio website built to showcase my projects, experience, and interests. The site is generated using a Static Site Generator (SSG), providing excellent performance and discoverability.
